DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety under practical use of Glucobay OD. A total of 5,000 patients are to be enrolled to the study and assessed during 1 year observation period.
DOC.brief_title: Special Drug Use Investigation of Glucobay OD
DOC.criteria: Glucobay OD naive diabetics. patients with at least one of the following conditions: Uncontrollable with dietary therapy,exercise cure, diabetes medication, insulin therapy. Patients who are contraindicated based on the product label
